name: Nite Ize Knotbone Adjustable Bungee
description: Nite Ize has built a better bungee. It fits better. It clips on more securely. Adjust it to the right length for the job, then fix it there with an easy wrap-and-lock motion. No slack. No tug-of-war. Carbiner-style clips keep the bungee – and your cargo – in place more reliably than open hooks. Plastic top caps clip to the cord itself to prevent loose, flappy ends.Durable, high-quality cord won’t lose its stretch over time.Two sizes: Small, 5mm cord that adjusts from 15-71cm; and Large, 9mm cord that adjusts from 25-122cm.
